challenges.title: Q1: Monolith vs Microservices
challenges.description: A main advantage of microservices over a monolithic architecture is:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) All teams must use the same language and framework
b) Easier independent deployment and scaling of services
c) Single database schema is enforced
d) No need for network communication at all
